languages.text: "Отнюдь. Операция "Драгоценный страж" в шаге от заключительного этапа. Активность же местных обитателей — неприятная, однако не значимая деталь. Они должны были сторожить эту вещь, но все проспали, и лишь эманации К'тан разбудили эту ленивую охрану".

"Not at all. Operation Precious Sentinel is in its final stages. The increase in xenos activity is a vexing yet trivial development in the grand scheme of things. They were supposed to guard the device, but they slept through the intrusion, and only the C'tan Shard's emanations could make them stir."
languages.original_text: "Отнюдь. Операция "Драгоценный страж" в шаге от заключительного этапа. Активность же местных обитателей — неприятная, однако не значимая деталь. Они должны были сторожить эту вещь, но все проспали, и лишь эманации К'тан разбудили эту ленивую охрану".

traits.locale_text: "Not at all. The 'Precious Guardian' operation is all but one step away from its' final stage. The liveliness of local inhabitants is an annoying, but trivial detail in the grand scheme of things. They were supposed to guard this item, but they overslept, and only C'Tan's emanations have managed to wake up those lazy guards."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "Not at all. The 'Precious Guardian' operation is all but one step away from its' final stage. The liveliness of local inhabitants is an annoying, but trivial detail in the grand scheme of things. They were supposed to guard this item, but they overslept, and only C'Tan's emanations have managed to wake up those lazy guards."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "Not at all. The Precious Guardian operation is all but one step away from its final stage. The liveliness of the locals is an annoying yet trivial detail in the grand scheme of things. They were supposed to guard this item, but they overslept, and only the C'Tan's emanations managed to wake up those lazy guards."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "Not at all. The Precious Guardian operation is all but one step away from its final stage. The liveliness of the locals is an annoying yet trivial detail in the grand scheme of things. They were supposed to guard this item, but they overslept, and only the C'Tan's emanations managed to wake up those lazy guards."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "Not at all. Operation Precious Sentinel is only a step away from its final stage. The increase in xenos activity is a vexing yet trivial development in the grand scheme of things. They were supposed to guard the device, but they slept through the intrusion, and only the C'tan's emanations could make them stir."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "Not at all. Operation Precious Sentinel is in its final stages. The increase in xenos activity is a vexing yet trivial development in the grand scheme of things. They were supposed to guard the device, but they slept through the intrusion, and only the C'tan Shard's emanations could make them stir."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: « Pas du tout. L'opération Précieuse Sentinelle approche déjà de sa phase finale. Bien que l'intensification des activités xénos soit fâcheuse, ce n'est qu'un détail insignifiant à l'échelle de mon plan. Ils étaient censés garder le dispositif, mais ils n'ont fait que dormir pendant l'intrusion et seules les émanations du C'tan ont réussi à les réveiller. »
languages.original_text: "Not at all. Operation Precious Sentinel is in its final stages. The increase in xenos activity is a vexing yet trivial development in the grand scheme of things. They were supposed to guard the device, but they slept through the intrusion, and only the C'tan Shard's emanations could make them stir."

traits.locale_text: « Pas du tout. L'opération Précieuse Sentinelle va bientôt entrer dans sa phase finale. L'intensification des activités des xénos est certes fâcheuse, mais ce n'est qu'un détail insignifiant à l'échelle de mon plan. Ils étaient censés garder le dispositif, mais ils n'ont fait que dormir pendant l'intrusion et seules les émanations du C'tan ont réussi à les réveiller. »
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: «En absoluto. La operación Centinela Preciado está en sus fases finales. El aumento de actividad xenos es un detalle irritante pero trivial, realmente. Tendrían que estar protegiendo el dispositivo, pero estaban dormidos durante la infiltración y solo las emanaciones del fragmento de C'tan pueden despertarlos».
languages.original_text: "Not at all. Operation Precious Sentinel is in its final stages. The increase in xenos activity is a vexing yet trivial development in the grand scheme of things. They were supposed to guard the device, but they slept through the intrusion, and only the C'tan Shard's emanations could make them stir."

traits.locale_text: «En absoluto. La operación Guardián Preciado está a un solo paso de su última fase. El ánimo de los habitantes es un detalle molesto, pero trivial en comparación. Debían proteger este objeto, pero se han dormido y solo las emanaciones del C'Tan han conseguido despertar a los muy vagos».
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: “完全算不上问题，神圣守护计划已经进入了最终阶段。就算异形活动过于频繁，也只能算是令恼人的细节而已。它们本该守护这件圣物，可它们却一直在蒙头大睡，只有星神碎片的能量波动才能唤醒这群懒惰的守卫。”
languages.original_text: "Not at all. Operation Precious Sentinel is in its final stages. The increase in xenos activity is a vexing yet trivial development in the grand scheme of things. They were supposed to guard the device, but they slept through the intrusion, and only the C'tan Shard's emanations could make them stir."

traits.locale_text: “完全算不上问题，神圣守护计划离最后阶段只差一步之遥。就算当地居民过于活跃，在这个计划之中，也仅仅算是令人厌恶而微不足道的细节而已。他们本该守护这件圣物，可他们睡过头了。只有星神的能量波动才能唤醒这群懒惰的守卫。”
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Keineswegs. Operation 'Wertvoller Wächter' befindet sich in der letzten Phase. Der Anstieg an Xenos-Aktivität ist im Großen und Ganzen betrachtet nur ein unbedeutendes kleines Ärgernis. Sie sollten das Gerät bewachen, haben das Eindringen jedoch verschlafen, und nur die Ausstrahlungen des C'tan-Fragments konnten sie wecken."
languages.original_text: "Not at all. Operation Precious Sentinel is in its final stages. The increase in xenos activity is a vexing yet trivial development in the grand scheme of things. They were supposed to guard the device, but they slept through the intrusion, and only the C'tan Shard's emanations could make them stir."

traits.locale_text: "Keineswegs. Operation Wertvoller Wächter steht nur noch einen letzten Schritt vor der letzten Phase. Die Lebhaftigkeit der Einheimischen ist ein lästiges, aber unbedeutendes Detail im großen Ganzen. Sie sollten diesen Gegenstand bewachen, doch sie haben verschlafen, und erst die Ausströmungen des C'tan konnten diese faulen Wachen wecken."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: 「そんなことはない。プレシャス・センチネル作戦は、最終段階まであと一歩のところまで来ている。異種族の活動の増加は厄介なことではあるものの、大枠からみれば些細ななことだ。彼らの役目はこの装置を守ることだったはずなのだが、侵略の間を寝て過ごしてしまった。ク＝タン・シャードの放射音を聞いてようやく、怠け者の警備員たちは目を覚ましたのだ」
languages.original_text: "Not at all. Operation Precious Sentinel is in its final stages. The increase in xenos activity is a vexing yet trivial development in the grand scheme of things. They were supposed to guard the device, but they slept through the intrusion, and only the C'tan Shard's emanations could make them stir."

traits.locale_text: 「そんなことはない。プレシャス・センチネル作戦は、最終段階まであと一歩のところまで来ている。異種族の活動の増加は厄介なことではあるものの、大枠からみれば些細ななことだ。彼らの役目はこの装置を守ることだったはずなのだが、侵略の間を寝て過ごしてしまった。ク＝タン・シャードの放射音を聞いてようやく、怠け者の警備員たちは目を覚ましたのだ」
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Pek sayılmaz. Değerli Nöbetçi Operasyonu son aşamalarına geldi. Büyük resme bakıldığında zeno faaliyetlerindeki artış fazla önemli değil. Cihazı korumaları gerekiyordu ama istila sırasında uyuyakalmışlar, sadece C'tan Parçası'nın yayılımı onları uyandırabilir."
languages.original_text: "Not at all. Operation Precious Sentinel is in its final stages. The increase in xenos activity is a vexing yet trivial development in the grand scheme of things. They were supposed to guard the device, but they slept through the intrusion, and only the C'tan Shard's emanations could make them stir."
